page.title: 20LEISURE & ECOLOGY
page.content: The 1980's have seen a rise in more leisure time.People realise that exercise and fresh air are good for one's health.There is also a growing awareness of the important part played by the legacy of landscape in our history.The hedges,lanes and settlements of the countryside tells of our past. In this area of study there are some beautiful walks and during the last year,under the auspices of Landrake Parish Council,there have been parish boundary walks.It is hoped that these will become an annual event.Much of the walk is through private land (farms) but public footpaths are also used.Here is an opportunity for the local people to gain access to unfamiliar country of their own parish.Each walk so far has resulted in a doubling of numbers of walkers.
